title: Call_Me_Guru
author: Call_Me_Guru
content: Image is said to speak louder than voice. I search many things about bitcoin daily and I love what I found on the internet about it today and they made my day. This varies from the billboard of a fat badger that has been fully feed with bitcoin money to many urban transits where bitcoin is boldly written and advertised.This somehow made my day, I am happy to see them, people are not ashamed of the good news. I look forward to the day I will do mine.
